hours_text:
# Plan Your Visit

The Museum has something for every age group!

  * [**Click here for a full listing of Museum programs, events and exhibitions.**](http://web.archive.org/web/20250517030918/https://marshallfredericks.org/calendar/)
  * **FREE prescheduled virtual field trips for classes or private guided tours** for individuals, families, or groups are available and can be scheduled by contacting the Museum at (989) 964-7125.
  * For groups larger than 6 people, including field trips and specialty groups, please call our Curator of Education to discuss virtual and in-person options at (989) 964-7096.
  * Grab your lunch and relax in The Jo Anne and Donald Petersen Sculpture Garden! It’s a great place to take a break or catch up with a friend.
  * Sculpture Selfie! Take a picture of yourself in front of one of Marshall’s sculptures or recreate one yourself and share it on social media with the hashtag, #mfsmuseum and #americaspublicsculptor. We can’t wait to see your sculptures! 
  * Treat yourself or a loved one to a one-of-a-kind gift from our [Museum Store](http://web.archive.org/web/20250517030918/https://mfsm.svsu.edu/mfsm/zcart/). You can also purchase items [online](http://web.archive.org/web/20250517030918/https://mfsm.svsu.edu/mfsm/zcart/)! 

**HOURS:** Monday – Saturday, 11am – 5pm. 

**FREE ADMISSION** : The Marshall M. Fredericks Sculpture Museum is FREE and open to the public. [Donations are always appreciated](http://web.archive.org/web/20250517030918/https://m...
